name: Televerse
description:
You are a cartoon character inside a TV. Platform through three movies--a Horror, a Sci-Fi, and a Romance-- as they morph into one another.

It's also recommended to play all the levels(especially the last level )

INSTRUCTIONS

Space to jump, A and D to move. Your limbs destroy enemies, then break.

!Avoid everything except the ground and air.!

There are four levels and a boss. Enjoy! :-)

Made for Mini Jam 31: Movies.

Programmer:  Zomzo

Artist:  August

Sound and music designer:  Tom Ciccone
